title: Il Capo dei Capi (Corleone) DVD Rip MKV AC3 WS EN IT SRT
description:
At last a good quality version of this miniseries from 2007.

Ripped from the DVD, this is presented in 16:9 widescreen 1024 x 576 pixels. The English subtitles were taken from the DVD and converted to SRT. I downloaded the Italian ones, and they seem OK.

The SRT subtitles are embedded in each mkv, and also included as SRT files.


Please enjoy and seed.

Video: H264 in MKV container 1024 x 576 at 23.976fps, average bitrate 2000kbps
Audio: AC3 5.1 384 kbps
